datas.question: tools that ikea use in manufacturing goods
datas.answer:
Based on the search results, here is the key information about the tools IKEA uses in manufacturing their goods:
IKEA provides all the tools required for assembly with each of their furniture products. Typically, this includes items like allen wrenches, nuts, bolts, and screws that are needed to assemble the furniture.
The assembly documents for each IKEA product specify exactly which tools are included with that particular item. If any additional tools are required, such as drills or hammers, this will be noted in the assembly instructions.
IKEA's focus on efficient and standardized production processes means they use a limited selection of raw materials and standardized parts across their product line. This allows them to streamline the manufacturing and assembly process, and provide all the necessary tools for customers to easily assemble the furniture themselves.
In summary, IKEA includes all the essential tools needed for assembly with their furniture products, in order to make the self-assembly process as simple and straightforward as possible for customers.
ground_truths:
The tools and technologies IKEA uses to manufacture its goods include:
IKEA has also made advances in warehouse automation, driving growth rates and entering the Industry 4.0 era by integrating manufacturing and logistics through technology. The IKEA Furniture Group relies on ultra-modern automated systems to produce furniture components.
Electronic Wheel (e-Wheel): IKEA analyzes the four phases of a product's life cycle, including resource extraction, production, use and recycling/disposal.
Generative AI (Generative AI): IKEA has partnered with ADP to launch a generative AI tool for production, demonstrating that IKEA also employs advanced technologies to optimize operations in its manufacturing processes.
Large-scale mechanical mass production model: In the production process of IKEA's home furnishing products, a large-scale mechanical mass production model is used, which can effectively reduce labor requirements.
Automated storage system: IKEA has introduced a new warehouse automation system at its Covina store that significantly improves the speed of order fulfillment and ensures that customers receive their products faster, whether they order in-store or online.
Artificial Intelligence (AI) for smarter demand forecasting: IKEA has developed an advanced tool that uses artificial intelligence to significantly improve the accuracy of its demand forecasts.
Hand tools and power tools: IKEA also offers a range of hand tools and power tools for consumers to assemble IKEA furniture or realize their own projects.

datas.question: casino sin deposit
datas.answer:
Los bonos sin depósito en casinos online en Chile son una excelente opción para los jugadores que quieren probar los juegos sin arriesgar su propio dinero. Estos bonos permiten a los usuarios jugar con dinero real sin tener que hacer un depósito previo.
Algunos de los principales beneficios de los bonos sin depósito en Chile son:

Ofrecen dinero gratis para jugar o giros gratis sin necesidad de depositar
Permiten a los jugadores nuevos probar los juegos del casino sin riesgo
Tienen requisitos de apuesta razonables, generalmente entre 30x y 35x
Pueden usarse en una variedad de juegos como tragamonedas, juegos de mesa y póker
Tienen límites de retiro de ganancias de entre $30,000 CLP y $100,000 CLP

Sin embargo, es importante tener en cuenta que no todos los casinos online en Chile ofrecen bonos sin depósito confiables. Se deben evitar aquellos que no cumplen con la normativa internacional y no garantizan una experiencia de juego segura.
En resumen, los bonos sin depósito son una excelente opción para los jugadores en Chile que quieren probar los casinos online sin arriesgar su propio dinero. Pero se debe tener cuidado de elegir solo casinos regulados y confiables.
ground_truths: op US casinos offering no deposit bonuses include BetMGM, Borgata, and 888Casino

datas.question: Busca como hacer un chatGPT con js, css y html
datas.answer:
Lamento informar que no es posible crear un chatGPT completo utilizando únicamente HTML, CSS y JavaScript. ChatGPT es un modelo de lenguaje de inteligencia artificial altamente avanzado, entrenado por Anthropic, que requiere una infraestructura y tecnología muy sofisticada que va más allá de las capacidades de estos lenguajes web básicos.
Sin embargo, sí es posible crear una interfaz web interactiva que simule algunas funcionalidades básicas de un asistente de IA, utilizando JavaScript para la lógica y programación, CSS para el diseño y HTML para la estructura. Algunos ejemplos de lo que se podría hacer:
Crear un chatbot simple

Usar JavaScript para procesar el texto ingresado por el usuario y generar respuestas predefinidas.
Mostrar las preguntas y respuestas en un cuadro de chat con HTML y CSS.

Implementar un sistema de preguntas y respuestas

Almacenar un conjunto de preguntas y respuestas en un objeto o array de JavaScript.
Usar JavaScript para comparar la entrada del usuario con las preguntas y devolver la respuesta correspondiente.
Presentar las preguntas y respuestas en una interfaz web con HTML y CSS.

Generar texto aleatorio

Utilizar JavaScript para seleccionar aleatoriamente frases o párrafos de un conjunto predefinido.
Mostrar el texto generado en una sección de la página web con HTML y CSS.

Estos son solo algunos ejemplos básicos de lo que se puede lograr con HTML, CSS y JavaScript. Sin embargo, replicar todas las capacidades avanzadas de ChatGPT requeriría de tecnologías de inteligencia artificial y aprendizaje automático mucho más complejas.

datas.question: what is agnostics
datas.answer:
Based on the search results, here is a concise answer to the question "what is agnostics":
Agnosticism is the view that the existence of God or any ultimate reality is unknown and probably unknowable. Agnostics are people who hold this position - they are not committed to believing in either the existence or non-existence of God.
Some key points about agnosticism:


Agnostics believe that humans can never know for certain whether God or a higher power exists. They maintain a position of uncertainty or neutrality on the matter.


Agnosticism is distinct from both theism (belief in God's existence) and atheism (belief in God's non-existence). Agnostics do not claim to know either way.


There are different types of agnosticism, including "strong" agnosticism which holds that the existence of God is inherently unknowable, and "weak" agnosticism which simply states a lack of knowledge or belief.


Agnosticism is not the same as being unsure or undecided about religion. Agnostics have a specific philosophical position that the truth about God's existence cannot be known.


So in summary, agnosticism refers to the view that the existence of God or any ultimate reality is unknown and likely unknowable to humans.
ground_truths: Agnostics are people who hold the view that the existence or non-existence of any ultimate reality, such as God, is unknown and probably unknowable
